testsuite.name: Login Functionality
testsuite.system-out:
@web @login @positive Scenario: Login with valid credentials # src/test/resources/features/web/login.feature:5 Given User is on the Saucedemo login page # web.steps.LoginSteps.user_is_on_login_page() When User enters username "standard_user" and password "secret_sauce" # web.steps.LoginSteps.user_enters_credentials(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And User clicks the login button # web.steps.LoginSteps.user_clicks_login_button() Then User should be redirected to the inventory page # web.steps.LoginSteps.user_should_see_inventory_page()
@web @login @negative Scenario: Login with invalid password # src/test/resources/features/web/login.feature:12 Given User is on the Saucedemo login page # web.steps.LoginSteps.user_is_on_login_page() When User enters username "standard_user" and password "wrong_password" # web.steps.LoginSteps.user_enters_credentials(java.lang.String,java.lang.String) And User clicks the login button # web.steps.LoginSteps.user_clicks_login_button() Then An error message should be displayed # web.steps.LoginSteps.error_message_should_be_displayed()
